items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely beautiful & worth it!!
items.body: Dress is beautiful! Color is spot on. Bought the violet dress. Lightweight & airy material. Love the comfort. Length is perfect. I'm 5 foot 3.75 inches. Bought a 2x. True to fit. Not tight in any areas. Waist belt is a nice touch. Very flowy. Highly recommend. Material is nice. Doesn't feel super cheap. Not terribly thin like some other brands I've tried. Perfect for Spring through Fall. Photos were taken in 2 different lightings. First is full sun & second is indirect sun in livingroom. Perfect violet for those in the Cool Winter color Palette, like myself. Read more
items.author: BrycenM

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty event dress
items.body: I got lots of comments on this dress at the wedding I wore it too. Size was true and fit great. Loved how it moved when I did, has just the right amount of stretch which made it comfortable to wear. Fabric was thick enough I didnâ€™t worry about it being see through. Color was that perfect navy blue I was looking for. Quality was good for the price. Only draw back is it did seem to snag a little more than I expected. Overall I would get this dress again. Read more
items.author: Nicole G.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Favorite dress!
items.body: One of my favorite dresses! As a taller girls who is also pretty plus size, I loved it! Love the v for the square. I personally donâ€™t like using it without a belt but love that I can change up the beats ðŸ‘Œ fits perfectly stretches well! Love using it for special events.. so good I bought it in purple and burgundy Read more
items.author: Jose/Valerie

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Bad Quality, not even one use
items.body: The dress itself is cute kinda Amish looking, the color is a bit brighter than the pictures. But the worst part is I didn't even get to wear it once before the front V shape broke. There's a V shape wire which broke through the thin fabric when I was trying it on, then when I tried to fix it another part broke through. Glad I'm still able to return this Read more
items.author: Mar

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish for Curvy Bodies
items.body: This dress is surprisingly one of my favorites. The fabric isn't scratchy, but it also isn't very soft. I don't use the belt tie it came with because it doesn't really offer the shape suggested in the photo - I use a different belt. The fabric is light enough that it's comfortable in the Florida heat. The color is true to image - very beautiful and perfect for fall/winter photography. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute, but not made well.
items.body: Cute, flattering, but poor quality. The wrist elastic broke the second time I wore it. So now I have one baggy sleeve and one that is how it is supposed to be. Not a great look. But prior to that it was super cute, light weight, good length, and flattering. Read more
items.author: Blair Fitzpatrick

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress
items.body: Decent dress. Material is light weight. Almost a little too big. I'm a 16/18, and it is a little large in bust, might want to size down. But I will be wearing corset over it for ren fair so it is ok. Read more
items.author: Cindy G.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Long Sleeve Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Long Sleeve Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Violet Purple, Rust, Burgundy, Black, Dusty Blue, Navy Blue, Red, Lake Blue, Pink, White, Beige, Purple, Wisteria. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
